languages.text: "Вас окутало облако из пестрых красок, что мешают собраться с мыслями. Не дайте им одурманить ваш разум".

traits.locale_text: "Вас окутало облако из пестрых красок, что мешают собраться с мыслями. Не дайте им одурманить ваш разум".

languages.text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."
languages.original_text: "Вас окутало облако из пестрых красок, что мешают собраться с мыслями. Не дайте им одурманить ваш разум".

traits.locale_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose your focus. You must not let them cloud your reason."
"A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose your focus. You must not let them cloud your reason."
"A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."
"A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."
"A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."
"A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

languages.text: 「まだら模様の色を持つ雲があなたを囲み、焦点を失わせています。判断を鈍らせてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

traits.locale_text: 「まだら模様の色を持つ雲があなたを囲み、焦点を失わせています。判断を鈍らせてはなりません」

languages.text: “你的身边充斥着一团团斑驳的色彩，这干扰了你的判断。你不能让这些东西蒙蔽你的理智。”
languages.original_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

traits.locale_text: “你的身边充斥着一团团斑驳的色彩，这干扰了你的判断。你不能让这些东西蒙蔽你的理智。”

languages.text: « Ne laissez pas le nuage de nuances bigarrées qui vous entoure altérer votre jugement. »
languages.original_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

traits.locale_text: « Ne laissez pas le nuage de nuances bigarrées qui vous entoure altérer votre jugement. »

languages.text: «{mf|Le|La} rodea una nube de colores moteados, y eso {mf|le|la} desconcentra. No debe permitir que enturbien su mente».
languages.original_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Le|La} rodea una nube de colores moteados, y eso {mf|le|la} desconcentra. No debe permitir que enturbien su mente».

languages.text: "Eine Wolke fleckiger Farben umgibt Euch, lässt Euren Fokus vergehen. Ihr dürft Euren Verstand nicht davon trüben lassen."
languages.original_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Wolke fleckiger Farben umgibt Euch, lässt Euren Fokus vergehen. Ihr dürft Euren Verstand nicht davon trüben lassen."

languages.text: "Alacalı bulacalı renklerden bir bulut, çevreni sarıp odaklanmana engel oluyor. Zihnini bulandırmalarına izin verme."
languages.original_text: "A cloud of mottled hues surrounds you, making you lose focus. You mustn't let them cloud your reason."

traits.locale_text: "Alacalı bulacalı renklerden bir bulut, çevreni sarıp odaklanmana engel oluyor. Zihnini bulandırmalarına izin verme."
